body_html: @goldsborough I think options 1 is fine in theory unless we run into something that we need from TH that wasn't supported in at the 0.4 ATen cut. I'm fine with 2, if we can get what we have working with both 0.4 and master in a reasonable manner. If not I may come back and ask for 3. Curious if @fmassa has any hard breaks since 0.4 in his extension.
